title: VA recovery data based on state allocations assigned to State Capital zip codes
name: VA recovery data based on state allocations assigned to State Capital zip codes
description: This data has been extracted from VA's feed of ARRA data. VA's feeds only provide this data by state, so I included the state capitol to better plot these numbers on the map.
